title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - May 28 2021
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - May 28 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Memorial Day edition of Open Line Friday. A month ago, Biden denied he spoke to Xi Jinping about the origins of covid. WH spokeswoman refuses to confirm or deny. Senator John Kennedy on the origins of the virus. Rush on the WHO covid coverup. Mother of pilot deployed to Afghanistan this morning, worried about the woke military leadership, discrimination against servicemen and women who refuse the vaccine. Defund the police advocate, Democrat Atlanta city councilman has white Mercedes stolen. Dems push for gun control. Rush on one of Obama's many attempts to grab guns after a tragic shooting. Rush talks about the founding of the Marine Corps-Law Enforcement Foundation.                                      PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


BLM founder resigns, blames right-wing for exposing her many mansions. Oregon teacher claims NEA is working on teachers who won't adopt "anti-racist" dogma. Rush talks to a teacher who blows the whistle on the white privilege curriculum. Caller pays tribute to her veteran father-in-law. Rush on the real meaning of Memorial Day. Road Trip with Rush: The Isley Brothers. Wife of active-duty military member who has noticed extreme racial bias in military hiring polices for leadership, giving preferences to minorities.                                        PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Biden proposes $6 trillion budget. Rush's lesson in baseline budgeting. The history of dittos. 30-year Army veteran on the woke ideas of the civilian leadership. Lou Ferrigno, the Incredible Hulk, gets a cochlear implant. Rush on his cochlear implant. EIB High Note: Army Sgt. Michael Ollis. Father of wounded vet. Caller shouts out family of veterans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
